events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection, involving their vehicle and another. Immediate claim filing requested to assess damages.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following review of the initial report and keywords such as 'vehicle' and 'collision'.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case with expertise in auto accident claims to ensure prompt and thorough service.
Acknowledgment of claim receipt sent to the customer confirming that their auto accident claim is now officially registered.
Request sent to the claimant for photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with claim evaluation.
The insured submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and repair cost estimates for the damaged car.
Investigation into the auto accident claim initiated, with an adjuster assigned to inspect damages and verify each partyâ€™s account.
The investigation concluded that the insured was not at fault and the damage reported matches with submitted evidence.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair costs and coverage limits, sent to the claimant for review and acceptance.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, mentioning satisfaction with the clarity and assistance provided.
After customer acceptance, the claim was officially approved to authorize payment for vehicle repairs.
Insurance payment was successfully issued to the repair shop to cover all approved damages of the vehicle.
Claim officially closed after confirmation that repairs were completed and payment processed without further issues.
All files and documentation related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
